text: Bap Teng Kang Waterfall is a waterfall in Arunachal Pradesh, India. It is a beautiful and striking waterfall in the city of Tawang, Arunachal Pradesh. Bap Teng Kang Waterfall attracts more tourists each year to the region of Tawang. The height of the Bap Teng Kang is 100 ft. The waterfall is situated in a paradise of green vegetation everywhere. ==References== Category:Waterfalls of Arunachal Pradesh Category:Environment of Arunachal Pradesh
title: Bap Teng Kang Waterfall
